description: Recipe Buddy helps you out in the kitchen!  Search thousands of recipes and have Recipe Buddy walk you through them step by step.  No registration or login is required.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Recipe Buddy how to make chicken marsala.
Alexa, ask Recipe Buddy to find me a recipe for philly cheese steak.
Alexa, ask Recipe Buddy how do I cook pad thai?
name: Recipe Buddy
shortDescription: Find recipes and ingredients for thousands of dishes.
